Package dk.jakobhandersen.multiregionexporterforcubase

Class AudioOutputter

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
dk.jakobhandersen.multiregionexporterforcubase.AudioOutputter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AudioOutputter
extends java.lang.Thread
(Thread) Class that does the actual outputting of file extracted from the input file. Uses SoX for splitting audio and FFMPEG for optional conversion.
Author:
Jakob Hougaard Andersen

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

  • Constructor Details

    • AudioOutputter

      public AudioOutputter​(InputAudioFile inputFile, java.util.List<AudioBite> audioBites, java.lang.String outputFolder, java.lang.String soxPath, java.lang.String ffmpegPath, java.lang.String temporaryFolderPath, boolean convertWithFfmpeg, java.lang.String convertWithFfmpegArguments, java.lang.String convertWithFfmpegFileEnding, boolean useCubaseNames, java.lang.String fixedName, ExporterEngine caller)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      inputFile - the audio input file (AudioInputFile) that should be split.
      audioBites - list of AudioBites that the inputFile should be split into.
      outputFolder - where to output the files
      soxPath - path to SoX program
      ffmpegPath - path to FFMPEG program
      convertWithFfmpeg - should the files be converted using ffmpeg after splitting
      convertWithFfmpegArguments - if converting with ffmpeg, this string is the supplied arguments
      convertWithFfmpegFileEnding - if converting with ffmpeg, this is the file ending (suffix) of the output files
      useCubaseNames - should Cubase names/descriptions be used for naming output files?
      fixedName - If useCubaseNames == false, this string will be used for naming the output audio files
      caller - the MultiRegionExporterForCubase to call when done splitting

      Specified by:

    • getFFMPEGCommand

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFFMPEGCommand​(java.lang.String inputFileName, AudioBite b, int index)
      Get the command to be sent to FFMPEG for conversion of each AudioBite
      Parameters:
      inputFileName - the temp file generated by SoX splitting
      b - current AudioBite to be extracted
      index - used for naming when ! useCubaseNames
      Returns:
      the command
